improvements.tr_note_01: Afaka mangataka alalana avy hatrany mba hiditra ao amin’ny fiangonana ireo manokatra kaonty vaovao

img_01.tr_desc: Safidio ny loham-pianakaviana, dia ampidiro avy eo hoe iza avy ny fianakaviany. Hanampy amin’ny fanamboarana fandaharam-pivoriana izany.

img_02.tr_desc: Fampidirina an’ireo fandaharan’ny fiangonana mbola hoavy, na ho an’ny herinandro manaraka io na ho an’ny taona manaraka.

img_03.tr_desc: Add language groups in the congregation settings and schedule the meetings more flexible.
